mapper.insert: insert into FILE_USE values ('FILE-'||FILE_STORAGE_SEQ.currval, '리스크 관리' , risk_approval_seq.currval )
mapper.select: select ra.*, t.text, r.REGISTRANT, r.REG_DATE, r.TYPE, rr.STATUS, r.RISK_KEY as r_risk_key, rr.RISK_RESPONSE_KEY as rr_risk_response_key, r.POSSIBILITY, r.PRIORITY, rr.CONTACT from RISK_RESPONSE rr left join risk r on r.RISK_KEY = rr.RISK_KEY left join RISK_APPROVAL ra on ra.RISK_RESPONSE_KEY = rr.RISK_RESPONSE_KEY left join task t on t.TASK_KEY = r.TASK_KEY

SELECT r.*, ta.text, rr.contact, rr.RISK_RESPONSE_KEY, rr.STATUS, rr.RESPONSE_METHOD,rr.STRATEGY FROM risk r left JOIN PROJECT p ON r.PROJECT_KEY = p.PROJECT_KEY LEFT JOIN task ta ON ta.TASK_KEY = r.TASK_KEY left join RISK_RESPONSE rr on rr.RISK_KEY = r.RISK_KEY WHERE r.RISK_KEY = #{risk_key}
